title: How to get my novel edited for free - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A Hannah, Editing is a critical part of turning a written piece of work into a marketable product. You can pay a professional editor to do the work or you can follow a number of alternative paths to the (hopefully) same result. Many beginning writers just don’t have the cash to pay hundred of dollars to get their book edited, so that option is not realistic. So, the alternatives… BETA Group. This is a group of peers who read your work and give constructive feedback. Pick them from your writer’s group or approach friends and family who are relatively well read. It’s a sort of many eyes can find things that a single set might miss. Often writers will form a group of 5–6 who will do this for each other throughout the writing process, meeting weekly over coffee or whisky to talk read and reflect.Quid pro Quo. Find another writer who is at a similar level of skill and offer to edit their work in exchange for their editing yours.Mentor. Find an editor or professional writer who is willing to teach. The process of editing becomes the platform for the instruction.Delay method. You become your own editor. Put some time, at least six months, between the completion of your first draft and the revision process. The time will enable you to view the work with a bit more clarity. Work on something else during the interim.The kindly elder. Depending largely on your age, there may be any number of people who will gladly help you by editing your book. These might be teachers, grandparents, aunts or uncles or other people you know who will do it for you because they just love helping out emerging artists.Publisher. Most publishers take on new authors in what they recognize as pretty raw. Your agent will see the potential in your work, but will recognize when it needs to be honed for the market. Publishing houses have editors who know the ins and out of the market and can help you polish and focus your work. Proceeds from your book pay the salary of the whole publication team from editor to layout artist. The more work they have to do will of course cut into the royalties they pay you, but if it makes the book sell, why not?

There is no editor who edit a book for free. However to save cost you can use free book editing software for the purpose. here are some free book editing softwares that are suggested by book editing companies like reedsy, Edioak,Bookbaby and many more. ●	Apache Open Office: One of the best replacements of MS word that is free for its users. It is a lightweight, compatible and fast word processor that provides a wide range of tools and functions that may help you in writing your book. ●	Focus writer: A simple, disturbance free book writing environment with a wide user interface which works on your mouse clicks. It is an open source software that can run all operating systems. It is a complete powerhouse that helps you write your book. ●	Google Docs: The most loved and my personal favourite free open source book writing software which is purely cloud based. It provides all basic and advanced functions which a book writing software should have. The best part of this software is that it automatically saves your script along working on it. ●	yWriter: A unique writing software that is specially designed for book writers. Heavy in structure and rich in stats, it helps the writers to write their book with a more optimistic approach. It is specially developed for windows users. ●	SmartEdit: An attractive word editing tool which is one of the best options that you use to write your book. ●	Scribus : The official forum where a writer can find answers to all their questions regarding book writing that is trusted worldwide. It is an open source desktop publishing site that helps in creating very beautiful and attractive manuscripts. ●	Write Monkey: One of my all time favourite writing tools is very flexible to use. One can take this into his USB drive and can run it into any machine that supports windows. It is one of the best options one can rely upon while writing their book. ●	Freemind: Most reliable software that a writer can use to portrait his thoughts and ideas. It is a high productivity java based mind mapping tool that can help in organizing ideas while writing your book. ●	Free Writer: A software that is designed for large documents. It is usually used for novel writing. It is a complete word processing package which you can use while writing your book. ●	RBE: A complete open source word processing, conversion and formatting tool which makes book writing an easier task.
